name: prysm-beacon-chain.avado.dnp.dappnode.eth
title: ETH2.0 Prysm beadon chain
description: Go on and test the upcoming ETH2.0 testnet (Medalla)! This package will install the ETH2.0 Beacon chain (Medalla), which is needed for running a validator. It is based on the Prysm client: a Go implementation of the Ethereum 2.0 Serenity protocol. The beacon chain is at the core of Ethereum 2.0
author: AVADO
